creator.name: Weeskamer van Essequebo en Demerary
creator.name_english: Orphans Chamber of Essequibo and Demerara
creator.his_func: In the 1740s Commander Storm van 's Gravesande founded an Orphans Chamber in Essequibo, similar to that in Middelburg (Zeeland). The orphan masters were entrusted with the supervision of minors and other persons unable to administer their properties. The board consisted of a Councillor of the judicial Council (president), two members and a secretary. Every three years the members of the committee changed. In any case, there was an Orphans Chamber in Demerara at the end of the 18th century.
